name: Loose Leaf
description:
Everyone has a story. You just need to find yours.

You are a little letter living between the pages of a loose-leaf notebook. It's hard to find the right way to the end of your story, but there are others around you to help--you just need to find them. Journey around in this charming, bite-sized platformer and make your way home.

Controls: 

- WASD / Arrow keys to move

- Spacebar to jump, double jump, and advance dialogue

- E to interact with characters to start dialogue

Contributors:

Joseph Horak - Narrative/Design

Connor Blankenship - Programming/Design

Mason Eastman - Programming

Kelly Shen - Art/Animation

Daniel Sanchez - Animation

Ashley Poprik - Narrative

Seth Eastman - Ideas Guy

Jasper Murphy - Music/Sound Design

Created in 48 hours for the 2021 EGaDS! Texas Game Jam :D
